description.raw:
Several changes are made to tunnel_qual.world in pull request #91, and this propagates those changes to the `tile_tsv.py` script used to generate that world. The key things are the changes to tunnel_qual.world (restoring xml comment and removing  duct models), and over 300 lines are removed from `tile_tsv.py`. The world file can be regenerated using the command in the xml comment block, and the only lines that will need to be changed are the manual pose updates to the artifacts and tunnel blocker models.

* c148ec4: the world name was changed from `default` to `tunnel_qual`, so add `--world-name` arg to tile_tsv.py and restore xml comment block in tunnel_qual.world

* 971dac5: remove duct models from tsv file instead of commenting them out

* f3b9d81: tile_tsv.py: include tunnel_staging_area model
